dict.string: Can't remember the exact name of the emoji you're looking for? No problem. Just type whatever comes to mind, and we'll take care of the rest.

0.9.0: Add support for the new emojis that Apple introduced in macOS 10.13.1 (67 new emojis!) 0.8.0: Add support for multi-word search terms (e.g., "joy face", "finger up") 0.7.0: Add support for the new emojis that Apple introduced in 10.12.0 and 10.12.2 (148 new emojis!) 0.6.1: Fix search result display to render icons for country flag emojis 0.6.0: Add support for the new emojis that Apple introduced in 10.11.1 (439 new emojis!) 0.5.0: Denote custom/nonstandard emoji in result list 0.4.0: Simplify search result display by only outputting the emoji's name and not its long list of keywords 0.3.0: Support action versioning 0.2.0: Use the emoji character as the icon for native emojis
